ValidationRule.description: Validation required to ensure Effective and Conclusion Dates are not left blank
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( RecordType.DeveloperName = 'StarTrack', OR( ISPICKVAL(Status__c, 'Deferral'), ISPICKVAL(Status__c, 'Go early') ), OR( ISNULL(Confirmed_Date__c), ISNULL(Conclusion_Date__c) ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Effective Date and/or Conclusion Date is required
